sections.description: I use cookies to ensure the basic functionalities of the website and to enhance your online experience. You can choose for each category to opt-in/out whenever you want. For more details relative to cookies and other sensitive data, please read the full privacy policy.

sections.title: Strictly necessary cookies
sections.description: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of my website. Without these cookies, the website would not work properly
